shoes.name: OrthoFeet Tilos Hands-Free
shoes.description: It's ready, set, go & for all day comfort in modern sneaker style. Our patented hands-free, slip-on technology means no time bent over to tie the laces. Water-repellent stretch uppers take the pressure off every curve and bump of your feet, while the advanced, customizable Ortho-Cushion System takes the pain out of every step, to always keep your healthy mobility on track.

shoes.name: OrthoFeet Kita Hands-Free
shoes.description: Kita's clean sporty design features our revolutionary hands-free slip-on technology. Tie the laces once, then never bend over to tie them again & just step in, without worrying about them slipping off when walking. From the water-repellant stretchable fabric uppers to the Ortho-Cushion System, Kita changes the game for mobility, support and comfort.

shoes.name: OrthoFeet Fairway Hands-Free Golf
shoes.description: Put your comfort to the fore and enjoy every round more with advanced support, heel-to-toe impact absorption and the easy walking stability of the Ortho-Cushion System. Our patented hands-free design offers slip-on ease and secure footing, with a golf-spike tread for traction on uneven surfaces.

shoes.name: OrthoFeet Ace Pickleball Hands-Free
shoes.description: More game, less pain. Purpose-built for pickleball, Ace dodges joint strain and pressure points with advanced heel-to-toe cushioning, roomy fit and superior body-aligning support. The patented hands-free design slips-on easily and stays secure.

shoes.name: OrthoFeet Nira Hands-Free
shoes.description: Nira takes your active, pain-free comfort to the next level in modern sneaker style. With our patented hands-free technology, you can skip the laces. Just step-in and go! The water-repellant stretch upper keeps pressure off sensitive areas, while an advanced orthotic sole design disperses walking impact, to get you happily through every day's finish line.

shoes.name: OrthoFeet Relay
shoes.description: Get ready for podiatrist-recommended comfort that's born to run. From the lightweight breathable nylon upper to the stable, high traction outsole, Relay keeps your mobility in the lead. Leave pain behind with a heel-to-toe max cushioned sole and a near custom fit, while the Ortho-Cushion System offloads pressure and aligns ergonomic support for every stride.

shoes.name: Dr. Comfort William X Diabetic Shoes
shoes.description: Men's Double Depth Casual Shoe – Designed for comfort and support, this sleek casual shoe features extra depth to accommodate a variety of foot needs. Double Depth Construction – Provides additional space to accommodate severe edema, internal braces, and AFOs.

shoes.name: Skechers Go Walk Joy Sneaker
shoes.description: If you're on a tight budget, check out Skechers Go Walk Joy Sneakers. These shoes slip on and off easily, and are extremely comfortable to wear, thanks to their plush cushioning.

shoes.name: Dr. Comfort Refresh X Blue Diabetic Shoes
shoes.description: Have swollen feet? You might want to give these Dr. Comfort Refresh X Blue Diabetic shoes a try. These sneakers come in three widths: regular, wide, and X-wide, and sizes 4 through 12. We're fans of the seamless inside lining, which helps reduce unnecessary rubbing of toes.

shoes.name: OrthoFeet Tilos Hands-Free
shoes.description: It's ready, set, go & for all day comfort in modern sneaker style. Our patented hands-free, slip-on technology means no time bent over to tie the laces. Water-repellent stretch uppers take the pressure off every curve and bump of your feet, while the advanced, customizable Ortho-Cushion System takes the pain out of every step, to always keep your healthy mobility on track.

shoes.name: Dr. Comfort Annie X Diabetic shoes
shoes.description: Discover Ultimate Comfort with Vionic Relax II Women's Orthotic Slide Slippers. Step into a world of comfort and support with luxurious materials and advanced features.

shoes.name: Apt. 9 Denver Men's Dress Shoes
shoes.description: SHOE FEATURES Ortholite technology enables air flow for a cool foot, wicks away moisture, inhibits odor and fungus and provides long lasting cushioning. Flexible, traction outsole.

shoes.name: OrthoFeet Clara
shoes.description: Move easy, with all the comforts of home, even when you venture out. Slip into the faux fur lining (even the insole) for extra cozy protection. And take the pressure out of your steps with this ergonomic footwear designed to alleviate common foot pain.

shoes.name: Time and Tru Women's Ballet Block Heel Pumps
shoes.description: Step into plié-worthy style with these Ballet Block Heel Pumps from Time and Tru. These ballet heels add the perfect touch of vintage-inspired charm to any look. Features Memory Foam cushioning for comfort.

conditions.name: Plantar Fasciitis
conditions.description: Shoes with proper arch support and heel cushioning

conditions.name: Diabetic-Friendly
conditions.description: Non-binding footwear with extra depth for diabetic feet

conditions.name: Wide Toe
conditions.description: Shoes with wider toe box for comfort

conditions.name: Foot-Pain
conditions.description: Cushioned shoes designed to minimize general foot pain

conditions.name: Orthopedic
conditions.description: Shoes designed to support and align the foot, ankle, and lower limbs

styles.description: Shoes designed for sports and active lifestyles

styles.description: Formal footwear for professional or special occasions
